alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Burnet; Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:37PM CDT until May 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blanco County in south central Texas... Northeastern Gillespie County in south central Texas... Llano County in south central Texas... Southwestern Burnet County in south central Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Llano, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marble Falls, Kingsland, Llano, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Meadowlakes, Highland Haven, Castell, Inks Lake State Park, Lone Grove, Blowout, Stolz, Longhorn Cavern State Park, Oxford, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Cottonwood Shores and Sunrise Beach Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
